title: Top Places to visit in Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu
content: Pudukkottai is the administrative headquarters of Pudukkottai District in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is a big town located on the banks of River Vallaru, it has been ruled, at different times, by the Cholas, Mutharaiyars, Early Pandyas, Thondaimans, and the British. It is situated about 3
